baseSections.title: Introduction
baseSections.content: Results-driven Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience building scalable, high-performance applications. Adept at full-stack development, cloud architecture, and mentoring engineering teams to deliver impactful software solutions.

baseSections.title: Skills
content: Programming: Python, TypeScript, Java, Go, Rust
Backend: Django, FastAPI, Node.js, Express, Spring Boot
Infrastructure: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD

content.title: Senior Software Engineer
content.subtitle: TechCorp Inc.
bullets: Led the design and implementation of a microservices backend in Python (FastAPI), reducing average response time by 40% using Redis caching and optimized PostgreSQL queries.
Architected a scalable event-driven messaging system using Apache Kafka to process over 1 million daily user events.
Mentored 4 junior engineers and conducted daily code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices.

content.title: Software Engineer
content.subtitle: WebSolutions LLC
bullets: Developed responsive and accessible frontend components using React and TypeScript, improving user engagement by 25%.
Migrated a legacy monolith application to a serverless architecture using AWS Lambda and API Gateway, cutting infrastructure costs by 30%.
Implemented comprehensive unit and integration test suites using Jest and Pytest, raising code coverage from 55% to 85%.

content.title: Junior Web Developer
content.subtitle: Creative Agency Inc.
bullets: Actively collaborated with UX/UI designers to translate wireframes into interactive prototypes.
Integrated third-party RESTful APIs to deliver secure payment processing and content management capabilities.
Built dynamic client-side web applications using JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, serving over 50 regional business clients.

content.title: B.S. in Computer Science
content.subtitle: University of Technology
bullets: Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Distributed Systems, Database Architecture
President of the Computer Science Student Association (2017-2018)
